channel.title: Summer Movie Night
channel.description: Recent content on Summer Movie Night

item.title: Saturday, September 30th (7:30PM)
item.description: Frankenhooker 1990 | 85 mins A medical student sets out to recreate his decapitated fianc√©e by building her a new body made of Manhattan street prostitutes. Spookies 1986 | 85 mins A wicked sorcerer tries to sacrifice a group of people inside his house with the intention of using their vitality to keep his wife alive.

item.title: Saturday, September 2nd (7:30PM)
item.description: New York Ninja 2021 | 93 mins Originally shot in 1984 and not finished until 2021, New York Ninja is about a sound technician for a news station (John Liu) who becomes a vigilante ninja in New York City after his pregnant wife is murdered. American Rickshaw 1989 | 93 mins In a movie with way, way too much plot, a Miami manual rickshaw driver finds himself entangled in the murder of a man he just met.

item.title: Saturday, August 19th (7:30PM)
item.description: Alien Private Eye 1989 | 95 mins Aliens have long integrated themselves among the human population to the point that they are physically indistinguishable, except for their uniquely pointed ears; a physical trait they go to great lengths to hide or have surgically altered in order to fully blend into human society. Lemro, an alien, has found his calling on earth working as a private investigator. One day a beautiful and mysterious woman visits his office and shares the story of a mysterious disc shaped artifact which has the potential to destroy the human race, begging for Lemro's help in preventing such devastation.

item.title: Saturday, July 29th (7:30PM)
item.description: Undefeatable 1993 | 92 mins Kristi Jones avenges her sister's death at the hands of a crazed martial arts rapist with alarming mommy issues. Raw Force 1981 | 86 mins A group of martial-arts students is heading to an island that supposedly is home to the ghosts of martial artists who have lost their honor. A Hitler lookalike and his gang are running a female-slavery operation on the island as well.

item.title: Saturday, July 15th (7:30PM)
item.description: Primal Rage 1988 | 91 mins A scientist at a Florida university inadvertently creates a "rage virus" while performing experiments intended to restore dead brain tissue in baboons. When a journalist for the college paper breaks into the campus lab, he's bitten by one of the infected baboons; the virus soon spreads to a trio of rapists and a valley girl, all of whom go on killing sprees. Twisted Pair 2018 | 89 mins Identical twin brothers become hybrid A.

item.title: Saturday, July 1st (7:30PM)
item.description: Velocipastor 2017 | 75 mins After losing his parents, a priest travels to China, where he inherits a mysterious ability that allows him to turn into a dinosaur. At first horrified by this new power, a hooker convinces him to use it to fight crime. And ninjas. Attack of the Beast Creatures 1985 | 82 mins A group of shipwreck victims find themselves stranded on an uncharted island where they encounter demonic alien Cabbage Patch dolls made up to look like Marilyn Manson.

item.title: Saturday, June 17th (7:30PM)
item.description: Righting Wrongs 1986 | 92 mins Martial Arts legend Yuen Biao stars as Ha Ling-Ching, a respected prosecutor who has always followed the rule of law, but has recently found himself frustrated by the ineffectiveness of the court system. Ha is pushed over the edge by the murder of a key witness in a trial along with the witness's entire family. Fed up with the court's inability to punish the guilty and protect the innocent, Ha decides to take the law into his own hands and eliminate those responsible for the murders.

item.title: Saturday, October 15th (7:30PM)
item.description: Slaughter Day 1991 | 58 mins In the rural recesses of Hawaii, a pair of friends must fight an ancient evil force brought to life by an occult book that possesses a group of construction workers, turning them into murderous maniacs. Night of the Creeps 1986 | 88 mins In 1959, an alien experiment crashes to earth and infects a fraternity member. They freeze the body, but in the modern day, two geeks pledging a fraternity accidentally thaw the corpse, which proceeds to infect the campus with parasites that transform their hosts into killer zombies.

item.title: Saturday, October 1st (7:30PM)
item.description: Slaughter High 1986 | 90 mins Eight people with unintelligible accents are invited to their old high school for their ten-year reunion where a fellow former student, disfigured from a prank gone wrong, is out to seek revenge. Horror High 1973 | 85 mins A shock-filled tale of a serious and shy but brilliant science student who, when wrongfully forced to consume a new drug he'd created, becomes a modern day Jekyll and Hyde.

item.title: Saturday, September 17th (7:30PM)
item.description: Uninvited 1987 | 91 mins A cat infected with a genetically engineered virus escapes from a lab and goes on a killing spree, finding its way onboard a shady businessman's yacht loaded with young guests. Carnosaur 2 1995 | 83 mins A team of scientists go to a nuclear mining facility to investigate a possible meltdown and instead find a large amount of cloned dinosaurs.

item.title: Saturday, September 3rd (7:30PM)
item.description: Black Roses 1988 | 90 mins A tough Alabama cop is blackmailed by the FBI into going undercover in a violent Mississippi biker gang. Rock and Roll Nightmare 2021 | 1987 mins Originally shot in 1984 and not finished until 2021, New York Ninja is about a sound technician for a news station (John Liu) who becomes a vigilante ninja in New York City after his pregnant wife is murdered.

item.title: Saturday, August 20th (7:30PM)
item.description: Righting Wrongs 1986 | 92 mins Martial Arts legend Yuen Biao stars as Ha Ling-Ching, a respected prosecutor who has always followed the rule of law, but has recently found himself frustrated by the ineffectiveness of the court system. Ha is pushed over the edge by the murder of a key witness in a trial along with the witness's entire family. Fed up with the court's inability to punish the guilty and protect the innocent, Ha decides to take the law into his own hands and eliminate those responsible for the murders.

item.title: Saturday, July 23rd (7:30PM)
item.description: Alien Private Eye 1989 | 95 mins Aliens have long integrated themselves among the human population to the point that they are physically indistinguishable, except for their uniquely pointed ears; a physical trait they go to great lengths to hide or have surgically altered in order to fully blend into human society. Lemro, an alien, has found his calling on earth working as a private investigator. One day a beautiful and mysterious woman visits his office and shares the story of a mysterious disc shaped artifact which has the potential to destroy the human race, begging for Lemro's help in preventing such devastation.

item.title: Saturday, July 9th (7:30PM)
item.description: The Human Tornado 1976 | 96 mins Dolemite flees to California, where he helps Queen Bee and her Kung Fu prostitutes battle a local gangster. Trailer NSFW Petey Wheatstraw 1977 | 94 mins After being murdered by his rivals, Petey Wheatstraw is resurrected in exchange for marrying the devil's daughter, the world's ugliest woman. Trailer NSFW

item.title: Saturday, June 25th (7:30PM)
item.description: Sleepaway Camp 1983 | 84 mins After a horrible boating accident kills her family, shy, sullen Angela moves in with her eccentric Aunt Martha and protective cousin Ricky. One summer, Martha sends the kids to Camp Arawak. Soon after their arrival, bizarre, increasingly violent accidents claim the lives of various campers. Who is the twisted individual behind these murders? Madman 1981 | 88 mins Years ago, Madman Marz violently murdered his family only to escape into the woods before his execution could be completed.

item.title: Saturday, June 11th (7:30PM)
item.description: Hands of Steel 1986 | 94 mins A cyborg is programmed to kill a scientist who holds the fate of mankind in his hands. He fails and hides in a diner in a desert run by a woman who likes him. The people who sent him are after him and so is the local arm wrestling champ. Directed by Sergio Martino, director of such classics as 'American Rickshaw' American Rickshaw 1989 | 93 mins In a movie with way, way too much plot, a Miami manual rickshaw driver finds himself entangled in the murder of a man he just met.

item.title: Saturday, June 4th (7:30PM)
item.description: Stone Cold 1991 | 92 mins A tough Alabama cop is blackmailed by the FBI into going undercover in a violent Mississippi biker gang. New York Ninja 2021 | 93 mins Originally shot in 1984 and not finished until 2021, New York Ninja is about a sound technician for a news station (John Liu) who becomes a vigilante ninja in New York City after his pregnant wife is murdered.
